mapper.insert: insert into cornHeightAndChlo(DOY, TRT, NUM_1, NUM_2, NUM_3, height, chlorophyll) values (#{DOY},#{TRT},#{NUM_1},#{NUM_2},#{NUM_3},#{height},#{chlorophyll})
mapper.delete: delete from cornHeightAndChlo where DOY = #{DOY} and TRT = #{TRT} and NUM_1 = #{NUM_1} and NUM_2 = #{NUM_2}
mapper.select: select * from cornHeightAndChlo where DOY = #{DOY} and TRT = #{TRT} and NUM_1 = #{NUM_1} and NUM_2 = #{NUM_2}
